# Installation
> `npm install --save @types/jest-cli`

# Summary
This package contains type definitions for jest-cli (https://jestjs.io/).

# Details
Files were exported from https://github.com/DefinitelyTyped/DefinitelyTyped/tree/master/types/jest-cli
